intent_atoms.description: Wire the Integrity tab layout so aggregated ParseIssue rows support severity sorting, filtering, and node focus.
Connect Share menu actions to the refreshed plaintext and JSON exporters without diverging from ribbon and detail pane counts.
Aggregated ParseIssue rows must allow severity sorting, filtering, and node focus.
Share menu actions must use the refreshed plaintext and JSON exporters while maintaining consistency with ribbon and detail pane counts.

functional_units.name: Integrity Summary Tab
functional_units.description: Provides a tab layout that aggregates ParseIssue rows and supports severity sorting, filtering, and node focus; includes share menu actions for plaintext and JSON exporters linked to ribbon and detail pane counts.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogMonitor Audit Integration in SwiftUI Previews
functional_units.description: Enables SwiftUI previews to consume ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots, displaying audit diagnostics for ready, missing, and schema mismatch fixtures.
